definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: skull, head, poll (person) (on format. cf. Ba:NB 205; Aram. [[גּוּלְגַּלְתָּא]])—abs. ´[[ג]] 2Ki 9:35 + 3 t.; sf. [[גֻּלְגׇּלְתּוֹ]] Ju Jdg 9:53, 1Ch 10:10; pl. sf. [[גֻּלְגְּלֽתָם]] Nu 1:2 + 5 t.;—
skull, as broken by a stone Ju Jdg 9:53; as severed from body 2Ki 9:35, 1Ch 10:10.
head, poll (in counting, taxing, etc.; only P and late) ´[[עׂמֶר לַגּ]] Ex 16:16 an omer for every man; cf. Ex 38:26, Nu 1:2, Nu 1:18, Nu 1:20, Nu 1:22, Nu 3:47, 1Ch 23:3, 1Ch 23:24.
